Package eu.opends.trigger

Class TriggerCenter

java.lang.Object
eu.opends.trigger.TriggerCenter
public class TriggerCenter
extends java.lang.Object
This class is responsible for anything related to triggers on the streets.
Author:
Saied Tehrani, Rafael Math

    • performTriggerAction

      public static void performTriggerAction​(java.lang.String triggerID)
      Reports the collision of the car with a free hand placed trigger and performs the specified action (e.g. send a text to the screen)
      Parameters:
      triggerID - name of the trigger (needed to look up action)

    • performTrigger

      public static void performTrigger​(Trigger trigger)

    • performRemoteTriggerAction

      public static boolean performRemoteTriggerAction​(java.lang.String triggerID)
      Reports a remote trigger event and performs the specified action (e.g. send a text to the screen)
      Parameters:
      triggerID - name of the trigger (needed to look up action)

    • performCameraWaypointTriggerAction

      public static void performCameraWaypointTriggerAction​(java.lang.String triggerID)
      Reports a camer waypoint trigger event and performs the specified action (e.g. send a text to the screen)
      Parameters:
      triggerID - name of the trigger (needed to look up action)

    • removeTriggerReport

      public static void removeTriggerReport​(java.lang.String objectID)
      Every time a trigger is reported it will be added to trigger report list in order to avoid multiple instances of the event (e.g. if car still hits the trigger after 10 milliseconds). This method removes the given trigger from this list again.
      Parameters:
      objectID - ID of the trigger to be removed from the report list
